name: Star Wars: Galaxies - Starter Kit
summary: This is a bundle that includes the original Star Wars: Galaxies game, as well as its expansions "Jump to Light Speed" and "Rage of the Wookies." It is the initial physical release since the dreaded "New Game Experience" updates. Noteworthy changes include a complete redesign of the first 30 character levels, which now serve as both a tutorial and a continuous quest line. Additionally, the number of profession choices has been reduced to nine by merging some characters.
